title: Enchanted Shadows
description:
Enchanted Shadows is a spin-off of 
Balancing Karma
 and features the son of Moswen and Kijika, Jaiseki and how he meets and falls in love with Sarojin. They are stand alone stories and can be read independently of each other.This is a novella that was published on the author's Live Journal page (http://id-locke.livejournal.com/2011/...) along with a few one-shots. The author may re-edit and self-publish this story at a later date.
author: I.D. Locke
